'''Desert and Night''' is [[Candace]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Candace's hair is styled into low twintails with the back as well as her fringe cut short. She wears a black headband adorned with a gold symbol in front and a large golden headpiece at the back of her head that resembles a crescent moon.

Candace's outfit consists of a gold choker around her neck, a dark purple and off-white cropped top with gold details that exposes part of her chest, detached flowing purple sleeves with gold trinkets, and a purple loincloth with gold stripes worn over indigo shorts and held together with a large white piece of fabric adorned with a gold moon-shaped trinket. She has a large golden trinket around her right leg and sports purple and golden sleeves around her calves and gold-strapped sandals. Her {{Hydro}} [[Vision]] is attached to her pouch on her right thigh.
